titleStmt.title: The dammee cavalliers vvarning piece, in a view on the prophecy of the prophet Obadiah against the Idumean armies, that so cruelly insult over the Church and people of God.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Abraham Everet against Saint Magnus Church, at London Bridge,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: Abraham Everet against Saint Magnus Church
